name: panther
description: Access and download documents from Studocu (Studeersnel) without requiring an account.
author: Nguyen Phuc Vinh

scripts.bundle: vite build --mode download && vite build --mode popup
scripts.build: npm run bundle && rm -rf ./pack/* && zip -r ./pack/panther.zip src/ manifest.json LICENSE && unzip ./pack/panther.zip -d ./pack/panther
